pages.text: Horses are much more reliable in the world of Vesper.$(br2)To set a personal horse, sit on one and press the $(2)'P'$() key, you can only have one at any given time.$(br2)Once claimed, a horse can be called to you reguardless of how far you are from it in the world, press $(2)'V'$() to do this.
P.S. you can jump while riding in boats!
